body:
Well, the server seems to be down for me...
I've tried all the alternate ips I know...
BUT
on mcserver.org.. it says the server is online, with 200+ players..
Is the server down for something, and mcserver just glitching?
Or is there something wrong with mui connection..

Are any of you on the server?
and are any of you having this problem?
thx

title: Server down?

replies.body:
The hubs are down.

You can use [server].avic.us
replies.body_tagged:
The hubs are down.

You can use [server].avic.us

replies.body: Nolan I don't get it what do I type in?
replies.body_tagged: Nolan I don't get it what do I type in?

replies.body:
If you want to join the hub and then a server where you can play a game you need to use (the name of the server you want to join).avic.us
For example mczone02.avic.us; elim01.avic.us; luna.avic.us; etc.

replies.body: It's no big deal. I'm sure they'll be back up as soon as possible. But for now just follow Nolan's advice.
